import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Cart = () => { const [cartItem, setCartItem] = useState(); const [quantitySelect, setQuantitySelect] = useState(1); const [itemQuantity, setitemQuantity] = useState(); useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:3003/getcartitems').then(res => setCartItem([...res.data])).catch(err => console.log(err)) }, []) // console.log(cartItem.price) // setitemQuantity( // ) const handleQuantity =(e,index) => { // console.log(e.target.value) setQuantitySelect(e.target.value) console.log(cartItem[index]) } return ( <>

) } export default Cart
